casebody.data:
Robert Louis BELVEAL v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 5752. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit Jan. 7, 1958. Donald E. Kelley, U. S. Atty., and Robert S. Wham, Asst. U. S. Atty., Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, PICKETT, Circuit Judge, and RICE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
